trustfund: TF035693-BRAZIL - GAS SECTOR DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF035270-BRAZIL - GAS SECTOR DEVELOPMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
To complete the financing plan of the
            Gas Development Project, it is proposed to issue Notes in
            the US capital market supported by the World Bank's
            Partial Credit Guarantee (PCG) to mobilize US$180 million.
            The gas transport company on the Brazilian side (TBG) has
            obtained short-term bridge loans to avoid project slippage
            to continue the construction of the project with the
            understanding that the Bank will only provide the PCG when
            the market conditions make the issuance feasible. The
            guarantee will help catalyze private financing for the
            project through debt financing from capital markets. The
            proceeds of the Notes issue will be used to reimburse the
            bridge financing used to pay for eligible expenditures. The
            Bank's guarantee support will result in significant
            additionality by mobilizing longer maturities and narrower
            margins for the project debt.
